opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.

casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Jones, Appellant.
Submitted November 23, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
J ohn W. Packel, Assistant Defender, and Vincent J. Zicaardi, Defender, for appellant.
Joseph D. Grano and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, James D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 18, 1971:
